steps.title: Draw big oval.
steps.content: Draw big oval. Put a rectangle at the bottom, just barely overlapping the lower edge as seen.

steps.title: Add two smaller ovals.
steps.content: Add two smaller ovals. Add two lines to indicate the shape of the face. At this point it should almost like a stick figure boxing, or reaching up to high-five another stick figure.

steps.title: Draw a semicircle on one side of the big oval and add a triangle at the bottom.
steps.content: Draw a semicircle on one side of the big oval and add a triangle at the bottom. The arc will be the back of the head and the triangle is the curve of the neck.

steps.title: Detail the chin, lips, and nose.
steps.content: Detail the chin, lips, and nose. Connect the shapes to one another, so the silhouette starts looking more like a face and less like a work of abstract art.

steps.title: Erase all extraneous lines within the image.
steps.content: Erase all extraneous lines within the image. Draw the shadow of the hair by adding a few tufts near the top and the back.

steps.title: Outline the image using black ink (or crayon if you want).
steps.content: Outline the image using black ink (or crayon if you want). Fill the entire thing in with black color to finish up the silhouette.
